mnmz.create_not_exist: (The CREATE mod is not installed. Please install it first!)
advancement.c_mnmz.root.desc: This page is used to display the things added by datapack
advancement.c_mnmz.ore.desc: Follow the previous recipe, replace coal with other minerals, and make slight adjustments to the number of repetitions
advancement.c_mnmz.plant_copy.desc: Follow the previous recipe, replace leaves with other flowers or coral (fan)
advancement.c_mnmz.leaf_copy.desc: Follow the previous recipe, replace leaves with other type of leaves
advancement.c_mnmz.coral_block.desc: Follow the previous recipe, replace leaves with other flowers or coral (fan)
advancement.c_mnmz.block_crafting.desc: Print the "block_crafting_machine.nbt" Blueprint File from the Datapacket file, and finally place a Heavy Core above the crafter to assemble the multiblock crafting machine. Place the correct catalyst inside the crafter and the correct multiblock structure on top of the crafter to craft the corresponding item.The Blueprints for ALL items are in the schematics/ folder of the Datapack file
